actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to provide that ionization smoke detectors shall bear a label specifying that they contain radioactive materials.

summary.text: Makes it unlawful for any person engaged in the packing, labeling or distributing (other than a common carrier) of any ionization smoke detection device to distribute any such device which does not bear a specified health warning. Makes a violation of this Act an unfair or deceptive act or practice under the Federal Trade Commission Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide that ionization smoke detectors shall bear a label specifying that they contain radioactive materials.
